biolockj.util

Class SeqUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.SeqUtil

  • public class SeqUtil
extends Object
    This utility helps interact with FastA and FastQ sequence files.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FASTA_HEADER_DEFAULT_DELIM

      Illumina forward read indicator found in sequence header

      Illumina reverse read indicator found in sequence header

    • Method Detail

      • countNumReads

        public static int countNumReads(File seqFile)
                         throws Exception
        Method counts number of reads in the given sequence file by counting the number of lines and dividing by the number of lines/sample (fasta=2, fastq=4)
        Parameters:
        seqFile - Sequence file
        Returns:
        Number of reads in seqFile
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getHeader

        public static String getHeader(String line)
        Extract the header from the first line of a read (parse to first space). This part of the header line will be identical on forward and reverse reads, so can be used to find matching pairs of reads.

        To extract the header, trim to the Illumina read direction indicator, if it exists, otherwise to the 1st space. Method recognizes the headers: " 1:N:" and " 2:N:"

        Parameters:
        line - Sequence line
        Returns:
        Sequence header

      • getHeaders

        public static Set<String> getHeaders(File seq)
                              throws Exception
        Return the header of each read in the sequence file.
        Parameters:
        seq - Fasta or Fastq file
        Returns:
        Set of sequence headers
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to parse the seq file

      • getHeaders

        public static Set<String> getHeaders(File fwRead,
                                     File rvRead)
                              throws Exception
        Get valid headers found in both forward and reverse read.
        Parameters:
        fwRead - Forward read sequence file
        rvRead - Reverse read sequence file
        Returns:
        Sequence headers found in both files
        Throws:
        Exception - if I/O errors occur

      • getIupacBase

        public static String getIupacBase(String base)
        Return regex version of IUPAC DNA substitution bases so that only ACGT values are used. For example, if base = "Y", return "[CT]", if base = "A", return "A".
        Function returns base in the same case as the input parameter.
        Parameters:
        base - DNA Base
        Returns:
        regex version of IUPAC DNA substitution bases

      • getNumLinesPerRead

        public static int getNumLinesPerRead()
                              throws Exception
        Return number of lines per read (for fasta return 2, for fastq return 4)
        Returns:
        2 or 4
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence format

      • getNumReads

        public static long getNumReads(long numLines)
                        throws Exception
        Return number of reads given number of lines in a sample.
        Parameters:
        numLines - Total number of lines in sample
        Returns:
        Number of reads
        Throws:
        Exception - if number of reads cannot be determined

      • getPairedReads

        public static Map<File,File> getPairedReads(Collection<File> files)
                                     throws Exception
        Paired reads must have a unique file suffix to identify forward and reverse reads. Parameter files read and a map with forward read file names as keys and matching reverse reads as the map return value
        Parameters:
        files - List of paired read files
        Returns:
        Map with key=fwRead and val=rvRead
        Throws:
        ConfigViolationException - if unpaired reads are found and Config. = "Y"
        Exception - if other errors occur

      • getReadDirectionSuffix

        public static String getReadDirectionSuffix(File file)
                                     throws Exception
        Return read direction indicator for forward or reverse read if found in the file name.
        Parameters:
        file - Sequence file
        Returns:
        Forward or reverse read file suffix
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getReadDirectionSuffix

        public static String getReadDirectionSuffix(String fileName)
                                     throws Exception
        Return read direction indicator for forward or reverse read if found in the file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Sequence file name
        Returns:
        Forward or reverse read file suffix
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getSampleId

        public static String getSampleId(String value)
                          throws Exception
        Method extracts Sample ID from the name param. Possibly input is a file name so remove file extensions. If demultiplexing (RDP/Kraken support this option), input is a sequence header. If Config."metadata.fileNameColumn" is supplied, then possible return values are limited to the given samples ids, or "" if the file is not in the filename column.
        Parameters:
        value - File name or sequence header
        Returns:
        Sample ID
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine Sample ID

      • getSeqFiles

        public static List<File> getSeqFiles(Collection<File> files)
                              throws Exception
        Return only sequence files for sample IDs found in the metadata file.
        If Config."metadata.required" = "Y", an error is thrown to list the files that cannot be matched to a metadata row.
        Parameters:
        files - List of input files
        Returns:
        Module input sequence files
        Throws:
        Exception - if no input files are found

      • getSeqHeaderChars

        public static final List<String> getSeqHeaderChars()
                                            throws Exception
        Get all sequence header characters for fasta and fastq files.
        Returns:
        List of sequence header 1st character options
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence type

                       throws Exception
        Initialize Config params set by SeqUtil.
        Throws:
        Exception - if runtime errors occur

                       throws Exception

        Returns:

        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence type

      • isForwardRead

        public static boolean isForwardRead(String name)
                             throws Exception
        Return TRUE if reads are unpaired or if name does not contain the reverse read file suffix:
        Parameters:
        name - Name of file
        Returns:
        TRUE for unpaired or forward reads
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are missing or invalid

      • isGzipped

        public static boolean isGzipped(String fileName)
        Determine if file is gzipped based on its file extension.
        Any file ending with ".gz" is treated as a gzipped file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name
        Returns:
        TRUE if file name ends with .gz

      • isSeqFile

        public static boolean isSeqFile(File file)
                         throws Exception
        Verify 1st character of sequence header and mask 1st sequence for valid DNA/RNA bases "acgtu"
        Parameters:
        file - File
        Returns:
        TRUE if file is a squence file
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • isSeqModule

        public static boolean isSeqModule(BioModule module)
        Check the module to determine if it generated sequence file output.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        TRUE if module generated OTU count files

      • piplineHasSeqInput

        public static boolean piplineHasSeqInput()
                                  throws Exception
        Return TRUE if pipeline input files are sequence files.
        Returns:
        TRUE if pipeline input files are sequence files.
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • reverseComplement

        public static String reverseComplement(String dna)
                                throws Exception
        Return the DNA reverse compliment for the input dna parameter.
        Parameters:
        dna - DNA base sequence
        Returns:
        DNA reverse complement
        Throws:
        Exception - if sequence contains a non-standard letter (only ACGT accepted)

      • scanFirstLine

        public static String scanFirstLine(BufferedReader reader,
                                   File file)
                            throws Exception
        This method returns the 1st non-empty line and moves the BufferedReader pointer to this line. By passing the reader, subsequent calls to reader.readLine() will pick up from here.
        Parameters:
        reader - BufferedReader reader for sequence file
        file - Sequence file read by the BufferedReader (used for log and error messages)
        Returns:
        String First non-empty line
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • initSeqParams

        protected static void initSeqParams()
                             throws Exception
        Set "input.ignoreFiles", , and
        • Ignore the metadata file Config."metadata.filePath"
        • If Config pipeline contains biolockj.module.seq or biolockj.module.classifier BioModules, ignore non-(fasta/fastq) files found in Constants.INPUT_DIRS
        Throws:
        Exception - if Constants.INPUT_DIRS undefined or file reader I/O Exception occurs

      • registerPairedReadStatus

        protected static void registerPairedReadStatus()
                                        throws Exception
        Inspect the pipeline input files to determine if input includes paired reads.
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine if reads are paired
